Hazard Descriptions:
Cross border activity
(including impacts from migrants and law enforcement activities)
Significant law enforcement incident (e.g. civil unrest/occupation)
Coastal change: long-term total water level change (e.g., sea level rise, subsidence)

Coastal change: short-term total water level change 
(e.g., King Tides, "sunny day flooding")
Small to Moderate (M<6.0) earthquake (e.g., Natural or Induced earthquake)
Tsunami - local event (point source, e.g., landslide, submarine landslide, volcano)
Tsunami - local event (regional seismogenic, e.g., CSZ)
Illness or injury of DOI employees - General
Illness of DOI employees - Viral Pandemic
Toxicological - naturally occurring asbestos or erionite
Toxic soil geochemistry(e.g., Pb, As, Cd, Se)
Hazardous substance release - Flammable or toxic materials
